attributes.action: O2 recently had an outage on thier network. Refund to go to charity.
attributes.background: O2's recent outage affected around 32 Million individuals.I would like to run a petition for O2 to donate the refunds to a charity. O2 customers did not have coverage for less than 24 hours. Some less fortunate people, don't eat food for days. Few pounds to the less fortunate will make a difference.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because it's about something the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for. This would the responsibility of O2.
